modName: Realistic shader - GemFX preset performance friendly
summary:
Another alternative to the ENB and the injectSmaa/SweetFX !
This new injector was made by LuciferHawk !
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]Hi !

I decided to share my preset for the awesome GemFX injector by LuciferHawk :)
This injector work like SweetFX or ENB, with the minimal FPS drop of the SFX 1.5.1, but with more effects and shaders, and imho better color correction (note the GemFX containt all the SweetFX shader ^^ ).

I made this preset for a realistic look, more saturated than vanilla but not too much :p

[u]Installation :[/u]

[/size][list][*][size=3]Download the GEMFX 1.0.6 from [url=http://www.twcenter.net/forums/showthread.php?672484-Generic-GEMFX-Version-1-0-6]here[/url] ( Thanks to LuciferHawk for his work ! ), and install it where you want.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Copy the GEMFX's Files you just installed (GEMFX dir, d3d9.dll, (dxgi.dll), GEMFX_configurator and the Readme) in your game directory.[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Extract the preset in the GemFX folder (the preset folder of the .zip must replace the original in Skyrim/GemFX/)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]And enjoy ![/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[u][b]Difference beetween Performance and Full :

[/b][/u]The only difference is the Ambient lighting, so in the performance preset there is no dirt lens / lens flare

[b][u]Performance hit :[/u][/b]

I made a little benchmark [url=https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1Jt2WK3NNcdqKNOoc69ICalF1LM0c5eyCuzk8yeF9fb8/pubhtml]here[/url]

On my desktop (and certainly with any high-end PC), there is almost no performance hit (2-3 fps). So i make the test on my GPU-limited laptop to see a real impact.



Note this could work with almost all the Dx9/10/11 Games ![/size]
